channel.title: Kill or Smite command
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone had a code for a command that will kill a player automatically when you do the command. I want the GFX to be the one with a lightning bolt coming down on them. Don't remember what GFX that is. I can find the GFX code if it's too much trouble for you.
Thanks.
